# **Tender Announcement: Supply and Delivery of a Metallic and Polymeric Materials Impact Tester**

## URN: cb-16-62136239
## Amendment: 4
## Solicitation Number: 23-58124_B
## Publication Date: April 25, 2024
## Closing Date: May 30, 2024 (14:00:00)
## Client: National Research Council of Canada

### Tender Overview

The National Research Council Canada (NRC) invites interested bidders to submit a proposal for the supply and delivery of a metallic and polymeric materials impact tester. The impact tester shall be capable of measuring the absorbed energy of metallic and polymeric materials.

### Tender Requirements

The award of the contract will be based on the lowest price submitted by the bidder. The following technical specifications shall be met:

* Manufacturer/Model: [To be specified by the NRC]
* Functional requirements: capable of measuring absorbed energy of metallic and polymeric materials
* Measuring capabilities: to be specified in the tender document

### Additional Requirements

The tender submission must include a detailed description of the impact tester, its operational parameters, and how it meets the specified requirements.
